getAutoStartSharedElementTransition().Description: Returns true if auto startPostponedEnterTransition() when bound to logo. When it's disabled, app must call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewSharedElementHelper#startPostponedEnterTransition_E@ to kick off windowEnterTransition. By default, it is disabled when there is no windowEnterSharedElementTransition set on the activity.

setAutoStartSharedElementTransition(bool.Description: Enable or disable auto startPostponedEnterTransition() when bound to logo. When it's disabled, app must call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewSharedElementHelper#startPostponedEnterTransition_E@ to kick off windowEnterTransition. By default, it is disabled when there is no windowEnterSharedElementTransition set on the activity.

ClassDesc: Helper class to assist delayed shared element activity transition for view created by @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter_E@. User must call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewSharedElementHelper#setSharedElementEnterTransition_E@ during activity onCreate() and call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter#setListener_E@. The helper implements @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter#Listener_E@ and starts delayed activity transition once @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter#Listener#onBindLogo_E@ is called.
